title: Telegraph readers have picked their England team to take on South Africa in the Rugby World Cup 2019 final - here are the results
text:
England take on South Africa in the final of the Rugby World Cup on Saturday and there are a couple of selection dilemmas facing Eddie Jones.

Has George Ford finally nailed down his place? Is Courtney Lawes better starting than coming on from the bench? Are injury concerns over Jonny May and Jack Nowell enough to leave them out?

We asked our Telegraph readers to vote on the England team to take on South Africa on Saturday, and you can read the results below.

15. Elliot Daly - 74 per cent

Daly has won the confidence of voters jumping from 51 per cent for the semi-final to 74 per cent...
description: England take on South Africa in the final of the Rugby World Cup on Saturday and there are a couple of selection dilemmas facing Eddie Jones.
